<task>

Maintain a document on development style with information on norms to develop to ensure clarity, separation of concerns, monitoring important relevant concerns, or whatever best practices would help you do this better, so as to prevent these problems in the future.
</task>

<read_file>
<path>CMakeLists.txt</path>
</read_file>

1 | cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.12)
 2 | project(shap VERSION 0.1.0)
 3 | 
 4 | # Set C++ compiler to GCC 10
 5 | set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER g++-10)
 6 | 
 7 | # Set C++ standard to C++20
 8 | set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)
 9 | set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
10 | set(CMAKE_CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
11 | 
12 | # Enable warnings and treat them as errors
13 | if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID MATCHES "GNU|Clang")
14 |     add_compile_options(
15 |         -Wall              # Enable all warnings
16 |         -Wextra            # Enable extra warnings
17 |         -Werror            # Treat warnings as errors
18 |         -Wuninitialized    # Warn about uninitialized variables
19 |         -Wshadow           # Warn about shadowed variables
20 |         -Wconversion       # Warn about implicit conversions
21 |         -pedantic          # Strict ISO C++
22 |     )
23 | endif()
24 | 
25 | # Add include directory
26 | include_directories(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
27 | 
28 | # Create library target with implementation files
29 | add_library(shap 
30 |     src/surface.cpp
31 |     src/path.cpp
32 |     src/metric.cpp
33 |     src/surface_collection.cpp
34 | )
35 | target_include_directories(shap PUBLIC 
36 |     $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include>
37 |     $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
38 | )
39 | 
40 | # Build examples
41 | add_executable(basic_demo examples/basic_demo.cpp)
42 | target_link_libraries(basic_demo PRIVATE shap)
43 | 
44 | # Build tests
45 | add_executable(path_tests tests/path_tests.cpp)
46 | target_link_libraries(path_tests PRIVATE shap)
47 | 
48 | # Enable testing
49 | enable_testing()
50 | add_test(NAME path_tests COMMAND path_tests)
51 | 
52 | # Install rules
53 | install(TARGETS shap
54 |     EXPORT shapTargets
55 |     LIBRARY DESTINATION lib
56 |     ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib
57 |     RUNTIME DESTINATION bin
58 |     INCLUDES DESTINATION include
59 | )
60 | 
61 | install(DIRECTORY include/shap
62 |     DESTINATION include
63 |     FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.hpp"
64 | )
65 | 
66 | install(EXPORT shapTargets
67 |     FILE shapTargets.cmake
68 |     NAMESPACE shap::
69 |     DESTINATION lib/cmake/shap
70 | )
71 |
